# GuessPix Mobile Game

This is a React Native/Expo mobile game where users try to guess what object is shown in zoomed or cropped images.

## Project Structure
- `App.js` - Main app component with screen navigation
- `screens/` - Contains all game screens (Splash, Game, Result)
- `assets/` - Image assets and resources

## Game Flow
1. Splash Screen - Logo and start button
2. Game Screen - Shows zoomed images with 4 multiple choice options
3. Result Screen - Shows final score and new game option

## Development Guidelines
- Use Expo/React Native best practices
- Follow the existing styling patterns
- Maintain responsive design for different screen sizes
- Keep the UI colorful and engaging for mobile users
- Use placeholder images from Picsum for development

## Key Features
- 10 questions per game
- Multiple choice answers (4 options)
- Immediate feedback (green for correct, red for incorrect)
- Score tracking
- Beautiful gradients and animations
